body.name: Magic Chef MCSCWD27W5 2.7 Cubic Foot Front Load Washing Washer And Dryer Machine Combo Combination Appliance, White
features: DUAL APPLIANCE: Compact 2.7 cubic foot front-load washer and dryer combination appliance makes laundry a breeze in a compact living space
LED CONTROL PANEL: Front-mounted control panel with LED display makes operation easy to use and access
INCLUDES: Includes 14 wash cycle options and 2 dry cycles for a custom washing experience
5 TEMP SETTINGS: Features 5 temperature settings and spin speeds for optimal performance
STAINLESS STEEL TUB: Tub clean cycle keeps your washer fresh and removes any residue left behind; Stainless steel inner drum accommodates large loads
body.description: Since the laundry room is where all the good dirt goes, this Magic Chef 2.7 Cubic Foot Front Load Washer And Dryer Combination is the machine that washes and dries it all clean. Pure satisfaction is an appliance that can do it all. This Magic Chef washer and dryer combination makes spending time in your laundry room loads of fun. It is perfect for smaller living spaces and has a stainless steel drum that won't peel, crack, or snag your fabrics. This appliance features a front load wash system that uses less water than a traditional washer and ventless drying that allows your clothes to dry without the need for an external vent outside. Non vented drying permits you to set up this unit anywhere you would like to in your home. With 14 wash cycle options, 5 wash and rinse temperature settings, and 2 dry cycles, this Magic Chef can do it all and make your life easier one load at a time. Soak and dry your troubles away with this Magic Chef all in one washer and dryer laundry solution.

productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 21 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,489 in Appliances (See Top 100 in Appliances) #304 in Portable Clothes Washing Machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! It’s the perfect size for out school bus conversion motor home. It washed and dried a load of towels with no issues. Doesn’t come out hot or anything but you can feel it’s dry, like an air dry cycle on a regular dryer. It does take a long time to dry BUT personally I think it’s worth the convenience. I do laundry at night so in the morning it’s done. The machine does shake a bit during the spin cycle and dry cycle but not the entire time and it was mostly a small vibration, nothing that annoyed me and doing the laundry at bedtime you don’t even notice the vibration

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the worst product, AND worst customer service.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one. I was sent two. I returned the one not needed and Factory Depot tells me they never received it - now I’ve got washer I can’t use because it backs up the water every time I use it, and am out 1400 on the second one I returned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The length of the discharge hose needed.
reviews.reviewText: The washer and dryer work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: CONS: - For such a small machine, this makes quite a bit of noise, and even shakes violently sometimes- Can only manage very small loads at a time- Normal drying cycle takes 4 HOURS AND 18 MINUTES!- Clothes barely come out dry after all that..PROS: - Can’t think of a single one. Just a complete joke of a machine. You’d be better off saving your money and finding a decent laundromat nearby. At least that won’t take half a day to do a single load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within <2 months of use
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product on 12/1/2019. It arrived in mid/late December but was not installed until January as we were in the middle of remodeling our laundry room. On 3/3/2020, the machine stopped working properly, giving error code E21. This meant that the machine was no longer draining properly and had to be manually drained of multiple gallons of water. As a new appliance, this was still under warranty. We submitted a claim on 3/4. And were initially offered a service date of 3/18 - two full weeks without the ability to do laundry. After contacting the manufacturer, the appointment was changed to a different appliance repair contractor and moved to 3/13, however, the otherwise offered nothing and felt over a week relegated to going to a laundromat was acceptable after having just paid for a brand new appliance from them. I will never buy from Magic Chef again. An appliance of this price point shouldn't break with less than 2 months of operation. My last washer was an LG and operated wonderfully for 10 years with no issues. I would not suggest purchasing this specific product nor any other product from this brand due to the disregard with which they treat their customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars AWFUL. Does not dry very well at all.
reviews.reviewText: This combo is SO much worse than a separate washer and dryer. For one, to wash and dry a regular load takes 4+ hours. What??? This works on regular 120 volt and does not have a dryer vent. That's why it doesn't work -- drying needs 240 volt and a vent to send the humid air outside. I put a bath mat which was 50% dry (after hanging outside for an hour) in on "dry only" mode, and I swear it came out WETTER than when I put it in. Not kidding. I also tried to put the same bath mat on "spin only" (NOT "rinse and spin") and it also came out wetter in that mode!!! And it never really spun the mat, it just kind of tumbled it back and forth -- clockwise 5 seconds, stop, counter-clockwise 5 seconds, stop, over and over and over for 10 minutes... it never spun faster than maybe 10 rpm when it should be more than 1,000 rpm. This machine is a total joke, don't waste your time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Does blankets work in this? If it doesn't can you return it? I seen this on YouTube. I'm looking for something that can fit in my apartment that doesn't have any connections. The laundromat is to expensive.
